Introduction
Norman I. Platnick is a Curator Emeritus in the Division of Invertebrate Zoology, American Museum of Natural History. Norman does research in systematics of spiders and ricinuleids. His current project is 'North American Phrurolithidae'.
Skills and Expertise
Zoology
Phylogenetic Analysis
Systematics
